price: Kuma dã kana gani, a lõkacin da aka tsayar da su ga UbangiJinsu, Ya ce: "Ashe wannan bai zama gaskiya ba?" Suka ce: "Nã'am, muna rantsuwa da Ubangijinmu!" Ya ce: "To ku ɗanɗani azaba sabõda abin da kuka kasance kuna yi na kãfirci."
arabic: وَلَوۡ تَرَىٰٓ إِذۡ وُقِفُواْ عَلَىٰ رَبِّهِمۡۚ قَالَ أَلَيۡسَ هَٰذَا بِٱلۡحَقِّۚ قَالُواْ بَلَىٰ وَرَبِّنَاۚ قَالَ فَذُوقُواْ ٱلۡعَذَابَ بِمَا كُنتُمۡ تَكۡفُرُونَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.
